metadata.title: CVE-2024-35932 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium

balanced, we cannot guarantee consistency in the checkplane->state->fb == state->fb. This means that sometimes we can increasethe refcount in `prepare_fb` and don't decrease it in `cleanup_fb`. Theopposite can also be true.In fact, the struct drm_plane .state shouldn't be accessed directlybut instead, the `drm_atomic_get_new_plane_state()` helper function shouldbe used. So, we could stick to this check, but using`drm_atomic_get_new_plane_state()`. But actually, this check is not re---truncated---
